titles.title: To amend title 13, United States Code, to provide that the term of office of the Director of the Census shall be 5 years, to require that such Director report directly to the Secretary of Commerce, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Census.

bill.summary: 10/2/2000--Introduced. Amends provisions relating to the Director of the Bureau of the Census to: (1) require the Director to report directly to the Secretary of Commerce; and (2) provide that the term of office of the Director shall be five years.
